<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant folded with a known group size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uint r = grid&#95;size - group&#95;id &#42; group&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// get&#95;local&#95;size = (r &lt; group&#95;size) ? r : group&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have uniform-work-group-size (which is the default in OpenCL 1.2),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the grid&#95;size is required to be a multiple of group&#95;size). In this case:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// grid&#95;size - (group&#95;id &#42; group&#95;size) &lt; group&#95;size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// grid&#95;size &lt; group&#95;size + (group&#95;id &#42; group&#95;size)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (grid&#95;size / group&#95;size) &lt; 1 + group&#95;id</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// grid&#95;size / group&#95;size is at least 1, so we can conclude the select</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition is false (except for group&#95;id == 0, where the select result is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; 3; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;GroupSize = GroupSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;GridSize = GridSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
